StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecrui.ngOrganiza.ons]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
select organiza.on_id as Organiza.onId, organiza.on_type as Organiza.onType, meps_organiza.on_id as MepsOrganiza.onId, name as Name, short_name as ShortName, mcc_code as MccCode, street as 'Address/Street', street2 as 'Address/Street2', city as 'Address/City', state_code as 'Address/StateCode', zip_code as 'Address/ZipCode', isopen as 'IsOpen', is_assigned as IsAssigned, poc_email as PocEmail, OrgUnitId as OrgUnitId from mcriss.dbo.recrui.ng_organiza.on where organiza.on_type in ('RS', 'RSS', 'OSS') and deleted = 'N' and isopen = 'Y'
FOR XML PATH('Recrui.ngOrganiza.on'), ROOT('Recrui.ngOrganiza.ons')
